title: Death Knows My Name
description: MAYNE ST LECLAIR has spent her adult life closed off emotionally from the world around her. She learned very early on that those who get close to her end up dead. She knows she is cursed, but what she doesn't know is why.ECTAIN “ERIC” EDECK knows the pain he has caused Mayne but the connection is undeniable. Can Mayne get past the hurt and fall in love or has her heart been broken too many times?Is death playing some sort of cruel joke on Mayne St LeClair or is watching her suffer breaking Death’s heart?
author: Casse NaRome
